Interface GameControls

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GhostController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGameControls

    public interface GameControls
    The game controls, handling setting the velocity and direction of each player.
    Author:
    Timothy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doTick(long time)
      Retrieves the current status of each player and updates his/her velocity accordingly
